text: [redacted_name]：想輕鬆套現額外現金，但怕手續繁複？ 而家只需幾步申請，特選客戶更可即時批核信用卡「現金分期」計劃並最快於數分鐘內到賬。 我哋已經為你預先批核多一筆現金，你嘅每月手續費低至0.75%優惠(實際年利率為16.39%-17.73%)，即時網上申請更可享高達港幣1,500元手續費回贈！ 立即去[redacted_name]Mobile App或致電[redacted_number] 申請。
trans: [redacted_name]: Want to easily cash out extra funds but worried about complex procedures? Now, you can apply in just a few steps. Selected customers can get instant approval for the credit card "Cash Installment" plan and the funds can be credited within minutes. We have already pre-approved extra cash for you, with a monthly fee as low as 0.75% (effective annual rate is 16.39%-17.73%). Apply online now to enjoy up to HKD 1,500 in handling fee rebates! Apply now via [redacted_name] Mobile App or call [redacted_number] for more details.
